comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: LuxuryStore on April 05, 2024, 07:17:10 AMhttps://lux-iptv.store/Quote from: LuxuryStore on April 06, 2024, 06:39:11 AMhttps://lux-iptv.store/Making consecutive posts is not allowed. Please delete old bumps if you are to make new ones.Anyway, about the service. I made a test purchase, so far so good. I haven't faced any issues yet. I like the fact that there are 4K and HEVC versions for most live chances so that in times when the internet connection isn't that good, the HEVC channel versions still run smoothly.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: LuxuryStore on May 03, 2024, 07:12:05 PMhttps://lux-iptv.store/What happened to your service subscription and renewal options. Initially it was using an easy and fast automatic system via a payment process, but now someone has to contact you through Telegram or WhatsApp in order to subscribe?How does this work exactly?What if I don't have WhatsApp and Telegram?You are going to lose clients because of this.

comments.author: LuxuryStore
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 04, 2024, 12:30:16 AMQuote from: LuxuryStore on May 03, 2024, 07:12:05 PMhttps://lux-iptv.store/What happened to your service subscription and renewal options. Initially it was using an easy and fast automatic system via a payment process, but now someone has to contact you through Telegram or WhatsApp in order to subscribe?How does this work exactly?What if I don't have WhatsApp and Telegram?You are going to lose clients because of this.You can contact us through email and we will send you the payment details/invoice. Due to issues with payment processors we can not accept orders from the site.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: LuxuryStore on May 06, 2024, 06:08:31 PMYou can contact us through email and we will send you the payment details/invoice. Due to issues with payment processors we can not accept orders from the site. Is the payment processor issue going to be fixed some time in the near future or contacting you guys through social media/Email is going to be the method of making payments from now on?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Several weeks later, nothing regarding the payment processor fixed.The manual activation sucks, honestly. The service was good but if I have to wait for hours to get manually activated and yet the expiry even happens many hours way before the activation time. Then no, thank you.It was great knowing you.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 03, 2024, 01:12:38 AMSeveral weeks later, nothing regarding the payment processor fixed.The manual activation sucks, honestly. The service was good but if I have to wait for hours to get manually activated and yet the expiry even happens many hours way before the activation time. Then no, thank you.It was great knowing you.We all want the fastest and most pleasant experience when we buy something, so even though I agree that automatic purchase should be something that should exist, I personally don't have a problem with manual activation. If you buy a subscription for at least 3 months and want to extend the subscription, why wait for the last moment to extend if you can do it a few days before and thus prevent your subscription from expiring?

comments.author: LuxuryStore
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on August 02, 2024, 10:59:13 AMQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 03, 2024, 01:12:38 AMSeveral weeks later, nothing regarding the payment processor fixed.The manual activation sucks, honestly. The service was good but if I have to wait for hours to get manually activated and yet the expiry even happens many hours way before the activation time. Then no, thank you.It was great knowing you.We all want the fastest and most pleasant experience when we buy something, so even though I agree that automatic purchase should be something that should exist, I personally don't have a problem with manual activation. If you buy a subscription for at least 3 months and want to extend the subscription, why wait for the last moment to extend if you can do it a few days before and thus prevent your subscription from expiring?This has already been addressed and auto-purchasing is already enabled in the site since a long time. The reason why we had to pause auto-purchase due to issues in our payment accounts. Thanks for understanding. https://lux-iptv.store/
